meanings.definition: A cowboy or cattle driver in Spanish-speaking countries.
meanings.sent1: The vaquero rode his horse across the open range.
meanings.sent2: The vaquero herded the cattle into the pen at sunset.
meanings.sent3: The vaquero tried to lasso a cloud, thinking it was a stray calf.
meanings.sent4: The vaquero's determination was as strong as the leather of his saddle.
meanings.sent5: The image of the vaquero on horseback is iconic in Western movies.
